bFISPx-s6.memHandModelNotes: Note: If Row Crops includes orchards and nurseries then it should be added in the map units, or if it is possible to separate these.  Field sparrows will NOT use actively planted row crops, but WILL use abandoned, old fields.  Buffer FROM patches into auxiliary MUs using ecotone distance.
